Blue Capsule.description: Teeming with blue phosphor, this capsule will give you a *common* Nikogotchi.

Green Capsule.description: Teeming with green phosphor, this capsule will give you a *uncommon* Nikogotchi.

Red Capsule.description: Teeming with red phosphor, this capsule will give you a *rare* Nikogotchi.

Yellow Capsule.description: Teeming with yellow phosphor, this capsule will give you an ***extra rare*** Nikogotchi.

???.description: I don't even know how this got here.
